name: Camry
detail: The Toyota Camry is a stylish and reliable sedan with excellent fuel efficiency and advanced safety features. Perfect for both daily commuting and family trips.

name: Model 3
detail: The Tesla Model 3 is an all-electric sedan that combines long range, minimalist design, and cutting-edge technology. Features autopilot capabilities and over-the-air updates.
The Porsche 911 is an iconic sports car offering exceptional performance and handling. Features a distinctive design and premium build quality.

name: C-Class
detail: The Mercedes-Benz C-Class combines luxury, comfort, and performance. Features premium materials and advanced driver assistance systems.

name: Mustang
detail: The Ford Mustang is an American muscle car icon with powerful performance and bold styling. Features multiple engine options and modern technology.
